name: Zorglu
bio: Joined the fleet to fund his dream bakery on Neptune. He spends his off-hours kneading dough in zero-gravity, which he claims makes the bread fluffier. He is constantly worried that the oven timer will go off during a battle.
stories: Once accidentally used salt instead of sugar in the Admiral's birthday cake, nearly causing a mutiny.
Dreams of baking the world's largest souffl√©, but fears the vibrations of the ship's engines will collapse it.
Has a secret stash of yeast hidden in the torpedo bay.
Tried to bake a baguette in the engine exhaust port; it tasted like ozone.
Writes recipes on the back of target acquisition forms.
His apron is his most prized possession, inherited from his grandmother.
Believes that a well-baked cookie can solve any diplomatic crisis.
Is terrified of food critics, more so than enemy laser fire.
Practices icing decorations on the hull plating.
Once mistook a thermal detonator for a timer.
Hopes to one day retire to a quiet asteroid and open a patisserie.

family.name: Mimi
stories: Sent Zorglu a drawing of him safe at home, which he keeps tapped to his console.
Is learning to bake cookies but burns them every time.
Asks every night when Papa is coming home to taste her cakes.
Sends holovids of her trying to levitate flour.
Made a plush toy of Zorglu out of spare flight suit fabric.

family.name: Gorg
stories: Served in the last war and lost a tentacle, constantly reminds Zorglu to keep his head down.
Thinks baking is a waste of a good warrior's hands.
Secretly eats Zorglu's failed experiments.
Sends care packages of rock-hard biscuits that Zorglu uses as paperweights.
Complains about the 'softness' of the modern fleet.

friends.name: Bip
stories: Saved Zorglu from a falling meteor during boot camp.
They play space-chess every Sunday, though Bip always cheats.
Bip is the only one who likes Zorglu's 'experimental' spicy muffins.
They have a pact to open a cafe together if they survive.
Bip covers for Zorglu when he's late for roll call because of dough rising.

friends.name: Chef X
stories: Claims his souffles rise higher than Zorglu's.
Once sabotaged Zorglu's oven with a glitter bomb.
Zorglu secretly admires X's plating techniques.
They have a monthly 'bake-off' judged by the janitor.

name: Xylar
bio: A poet who was drafted against his will. He sees the beauty in the stars but the horror in the war. He writes haikus on the ammunition casings.
stories: Writes haikus about the emptiness of space on his breaks.
Refuses to shoot at anything that looks like a flower.
Compares the laser blasts to falling cherry blossoms.
Cries when he sees a ship explode, even if it's an enemy.
Has filled three notebooks with sonnets about the silence of the void.
Recites poetry over the comms channel, confusing the tactical officers.
Believes that words are stronger than plasma weaponry.
Wants to publish a collection titled 'Tears in the Nebula'.
Often pauses in the middle of a firefight to admire a supernova.
Is considering desertion to join a traveling theater troupe.
Writes letters to the enemies apologizing for the conflict.

family.name: Lyra
stories: Is expecting their third egg clutch and knits tiny sweaters for them.
Sends him pressed nebula flowers that crumble when he touches them.
Writes him long letters that smell of lavender and home.
Worries that Xylar is too soft for this hard universe.
promised to name their first hatchling 'Peace'.

family.name: Kael
stories: A decorated war hero who thinks Xylar is a disgrace.
Sends Xylar instructional videos on 'How to be a Killer'.
Secretly protects Xylar's reputation at headquarters.
Once punched a superior officer for mocking Xylar's poetry.
Hopes Xylar never has to fire a shot in anger.

friends.name: Unit 734
stories: Technically a cleaning bot, but a good listener to Xylar's verses.
Its memory bank is 90% full of Xylar's rejected drafts.
Beeps in iambic pentameter to cheer Xylar up.
Once polished Xylar's boots so shiny they reflected the stars.
Calculates the probability of Xylar becoming famous as 0.003%.

name: Glip
bio: Misses his gravity-turnips back on Mars. He has converted his bunk into a mini-greenhouse, much to the annoyance of his roommates.
stories: Created a small hydroponic garden in the ammo bay.
Talks to his plants more than his squadmates, claiming they are better listeners.
Is trying to breed a vacuum-resistant potato.
Smuggled a bag of soil on board in his helmet.
Cries when he eats dehydrated vegetables.
Names every single seedling 'Hope'.
Uses his water ration to water his ferns.
Dreams of a planet made entirely of compost.
Hates the color grey; paints his equipment green.
Believes that war is bad for the soil pH balance.
Once tried to plant a flag, but planted a tree instead.

family.name: Nana
stories: Needs Glip's salary for her squeaky hip operation.
Taught Glip how to sing to marigolds.
Sends him packets of seeds that are illegal in three sectors.
Knits him socks made of plant fibers.
Claims she can hear the plants screaming when the ship jumps to hyperspace.

family.name: Pop
stories: Thinks space is 'too empty' and needs more trees.
Sent Glip a shovel for his birthday (it was confiscated).
Writes letters on actual paper made from wood.
Is preserving the family farm for Glip's return.

friends.name: Sprout
stories: A giant talking turnip that only Glip can see.
Gives Glip terrible tactical advice.
Tells jokes about root vegetables.
Convinced Glip that the captain is a carrot in disguise.

name: Vex
bio: Thinks war is like the simulations. He is wrong. He is loud, clumsy, and desperately wants to be a hero, but usually just trips over things.
stories: Tripped over his own laser riffle during inspection.
Thinks the humans are just misunderstood pets and tries to pet them.
Salutes the janitor thinking he is an Admiral.
Wears his helmet backwards half the time.
Has a poster of the legendary 'Star Commander' in his locker.
Practices his 'victory pose' in the mirror every morning.
Accidentally ejected his lunch into space.
Asked the captain if they could stop for ice cream.
Thinks 'Friendly Fire' means shooting shapes into the sky.
Is constantly asking 'Are we there yet?'.
Tried to befriend a xenomorph. It went poorly.

family.name: General Zod
stories: Got Vex this job to toughen him up. Vex hates it.
Is constantly embarrassed by Vex's reports.
Sends Vex simplified manuals with lots of pictures.
Threatens to transfer Vex to waste management.
Secretly worries Vex won't survive the first week.

family.name: Momma Vex
stories: Packs his lunch with notes saying 'You're my hero'.
Polished his armor until it was too shiny for stealth.
Calls the command bridge to ask if Vex is eating enough.
Sent him a scarf that is 20 feet long.

friends.name: Kip
stories: They have a bet on who gets shot first.
Kip puts glue in Vex's boots.
They compete to see who can hold their breath longer in vacuum.
Kip saves the best dessert for Vex, secretly.
They promised to be buried next to each other.

name: Qwo
bio: Was invading planets before it was cool. He listens to vinyl records of black hole static and drinks organic nebula juice.
stories: Refuses to use standard issue plasma. It's too 'mainstream'.
Wears a vintage space suit from 1950 that leaks oxygen.
Claims he liked the Human Resistance 'before they got popular'.
Only shoots at prime numbered coordinates.
Complains that the ship's gravity is 'too artificial'.
Writes a blog that nobody reads about the aesthetics of war.
Has a mustache wax collection.
Thinks laser swords are ironic.
Critiques the color palette of the enemy uniforms.
Will only obey orders if they are given in a retro font.
Sips tea with his pinky out while piloting.

family.name: Exo
stories: Is a corporate lawyer. Qwo despises him.
Sends Qwo gift cards to chain restaurants.
Asks Qwo when he's going to get a 'real job'.
Secretly pays Qwo's rent.

friends.name: Sip
stories: Makes Qwo's organic stardust lattes.
Knows Qwo's order by heart: 'Extra hot, no foam, dash of anti-matter'.
Lets Qwo hang out in the cafe for hours without buying anything.
Is the only one who reads Qwo's blog.
Thinks Qwo is pretentious but harmless.

name: Dr. Uli
bio: Has a PhD in Human History. Fascinated by 'pizza'. He joined the invasion purely for field research and is constantly taking notes.
stories: Is writing a thesis on why humans wear hats.
Secretly wants to defect to try Chicago Deep Dish.
Thinks tanks are ceremonial parade floats.
Asks prisoners about their favorite cheese.
Has a collection of human bottle caps.
Misinterprets 'Take me to your leader' as a request for a tour guide.
Believes television commercials are historical documentaries.
Is learning to play the banjo.
Carries a clipboard into battle.
Tries to interview the opposing soldiers mid-fight.
Is worried about the preservation of human artifacts.

family.name: Prof. Xo
stories: Warned Uli that field work is dangerous.
Proofreads Uli's papers via subspace transmission.
Thinks the invasion is a terrible interruption to science.
Hopes Uli creates a comprehensive encyclopedia.
Sent Uli a magnifying glass.

friends.name: Librarian Bot
stories: Finds obscure facts for Uli.
Shushes people during orbital bombardments.
Organizes Uli's rock collection.
Is programmed to protect books at all costs.

name: Blorp
bio: Hasn't slept in 40 light-years. He exists on a cocktail of caffeine and adrenaline. He vibrates constantly and sees sounds.
stories: Drinking pure caffeine straight from the reactor.
Hallucinated a space-whale yesterday.
Thinks the stars are blinking in Morse code.
Can hear colors.
Sleeps with his eyes open, standing up.
His hands shake so much he's actually harder to hit.
Talks to the coffee machine.
Believes sleep is a conspiracy by the mattress lobby.
Rewired his console to dispense espresso.
Has chronic nightmares about running out of beans.
Is the ship's designated night watchman.

family.name: Zzz
stories: Is actually in a coma. Blorp works for his medical bills.
Was a champion sleeper before the accident.
Blorp reads him bedtime stories over the comms.
Is the reason Blorp refuses to sleep.
Family hopes he wakes up to see Blorp again.

friends.name: Mug
stories: A chipped ceramic mug that Blorp talks to.
Has 'World's Best Invader' printed on it.
Blorp protects it with his life.
Never judges Blorp.

name: Tink
bio: Can fix anything with duct tape and hope. He spends more time fixing the ship than flying it. Rumored to be half-cyborg.
stories: Fixed the hyperdrive with a piece of chewing gum.
Just wants to run Doom on the ship's computer.
Uses a wrench as a weapon.
Installed a sound system in the cockpit.
Speaks binary fluently.
Thinks the ship has a soul.
Refuses to read the manual.
His uniform is covered in oil stains.
Built a toaster that can also jam radar.
Hates wireless updates.
Is strictly 'turn it off and on again' about strategy.

friends.name: Sparky
stories: Follows Tink everywhere, beeping happily.
Was built from scrap metal and love.
Has a crush on the ship's navigation computer.
Saving Tink's life is its primary directive.
Likes to fetch wrenches.

friends.name: Volt
stories: Always borrows Tink's tools and never returns them.
Thinks he's a better engineer (he's not).
Electrocuted himself twice this week.
They play pranks involving low-voltage shocks.

name: Jinx
bio: Bad luck follows him everywhere. If something can go wrong, it happens to Jinx. His squadmates makes him walk 10 feet behind them.
stories: His laser jammed during the final exam.
Every ship he boards gets a flat tire.
Was struck by lightning in space.
Accidentally deleted the navigation database.
Tripped and declared war on a neutral planet.
His sandwich always falls jelly-side down.
Mirrors break when he looks at them.
Black cats cross his path, even on spaceships.
Lost his helmet during a spacewalk.
Is banned from casino planets.
Somehow acts as a lightning rod for enemy fire.

family.name: Lucky
stories: Won the lottery twice. Jinx hates him.
Found a diamond in his soup.
Never gets traffic tickets.
Sends Jinx 'Get Well Soon' cards preemptively.
Is blissfully unaware of Jinx's suffering.

name: Momo
bio: Believes food can end all wars. He smuggles spices instead of weapons. His dream is to cook a meal so good the enemy surrenders.
stories: Tried to offer a sandwich to a human tank.
His lasagna is banned in 3 systems for being too good.
Replaced his grenades with onions.
Cooking allows him to forget the screaming.
Wears a chef hat over his helmet.
Secretly feeds the prisoners gourmet meals.
Is writing a cookbook titled 'Diplomacy through Dumplings'.
Thinks every conflict is just 'hangry' people.
Uses a wok as a shield.
Sharpened his knives more than his bayonet.
Smells like garlic and gunpowder.

family.name: Popo
stories: Wanted Momo to be a soldier, not a cook.
Is a drill instructor who eats nails for breakfast.
Refuses to eat Momo's food.
secretly proud of Momo's resilience.
Calls Momo every Sunday to yell at him.

family.name: Coco
stories: Runs a successful noodle stand.
Sends Momo rare spices.
Defends Momo's choices to their dad.
Misses Momo's soup.

friends.name: Gaston
stories: A prisoner who loves Momo's food.
gives Momo cooking tips from Earth.
They discuss recipes through the cell bars.
Promised to open a restaurant with Momo after the war.

name: Krel
bio: Is only here to maximize fleet tax returns. Calculating the cost of every laser shot. He is the most boring alien alive.
stories: Audited the Captain mid-battle.
Worried that laser usage is over budget.
Files expense reports during dogfights.
Calculates the depreciation of the ship's hull.
Asks enemies for receipts.
Refuses to die because funeral costs are high.
Thinks fun is a non-deductible expense.
His battle cry is 'Audit this!'.
Is feared more than the Berserkers.
Counts bullets in his sleep.
Has a spreadsheet for everything.

family.name: Mrel
stories: She collects coupons for black holes.
They met at a tax seminar.
Their love language is filing jointly.
She knits sweaters in beige.
Sends him calculators.

friends.name: Calculator
stories: His only true friend.
Solar powered.
Never lies.
Has a cracked screen from a bar fight.
Krel talks to it when he's lonely.

name: Spud
bio: Thought he signed up for a farming expo. He is simple, honest, and completely out of his depth. He brings a bag of dirt everywhere.
stories: Keeps trying to plant seeds in the ship's hull.
Thinks the Earth is just a big potato.
Misses the smell of manure.
Uses a hoe as a weapon.
Calls the Admiral 'Sheriff'.
Sleeps in a pile of hay.
Thinks lasers are just fancy flashlights.
Wants to turn the ship into a tractor.
Sings country songs to the stars.
Hates synthetic food.
Is saving up to buy a new barn.

family.name: Bud
stories: Won 1st prize at the nebula fair for his giant squash.
Writes letters in crayon.
Is taking care of the farm while Spud is away.
Misses his dad's tractor rides.
Sent a drawing of a cow.

family.name: Ma
stories: Makes the best apple pie in the sector.
Praying for Spud's safe return.
Keeping the scarecrows in order.
Worried Spud will get too fancy in the city.

name: Rox
bio: Loves rocks. Like, really loves rocks. He stops mid-battle to pick up interesting pebbles. He is heavy and slow.
stories: Has a pet rock named 'Rocky'.
Gets distracted by shiny asteroids during combat.
Cataloging the mineral composition of the enemy base.
Thinks the moon is made of cheese (he checked).
Eats gravel for a snack.
His pockets are always full of stones.
Can tell you the age of a planet by licking it.
Is actually made of silicon.
Hates water.
Dreams of becoming a mountain.
Is very grounded.

friends.name: Pebble
stories: A smaller rock Rox carries.
Rox claims it speaks to him.
Used to smash open crates.
Rox draws a face on it.

name: Echo
bio: Took a vow of silence. Communicates via interpretive dance. It is very confusing during tactical briefings.
stories: Got trapped in an invisible box.
Confuses the enemy by pretending to pull a rope.
Walks against the wind in zero gravity.
Pretends to be a wall during stealth missions.
Painted his face white.
Never screams when hit.
Is surprisingly good at charades.
Annouces his presence with jazz hands.
The squad communicates with him via sign language.
Is actually terrified of noise.
Once defeated a guard by pretending to be a statue.

friends.name: Voice
stories: The only one who understands Echo's hand gestures.
Translates 'jazz hands' to 'open fire'.
Is tired of guessing what Echo wants for lunch.
Secretly wishes Echo would just speak.
Defends Echo's art.

name: Nova
bio: Obsessed with constellations. He navigates by the stars, which is useless because the ship has a computer. He is romantic and aloof.
stories: Named every star in the sector after his ex-girlfriends.
Needs glasses but thinks they look uncool.
Writes horoscopes for the crew.
Thinks the Big Dipper is a soup ladle.
Gets lost in the corridors constantly.
Believes he is guided by destiny.
Wears a cape.
Quotes Shakespeare incorrectly.
Is looking for the 'Second Star to the Right'.
Thinks black holes are just goth stars.
Sighs dramatically.

family.name: Stella
stories: Is an actual astronomer.
Corrects Nova's star charts.
Think Nova is embarrassing.
Send him real telescopes.

name: Fuzzy
bio: A bear that somehow got into a space suit. No one knows how he got here. He is surprisingly good at heavy lifting.
stories: Just wants honey.
Roars at the control panel until things happen.
Uses the escape pod as a hibernation den.
Ate the manual.
Chased a laser pointer for 3 hours.
Is the ship's mascot.
Scratches his back on the airlock door.
Caught a fish in the hydroponics bay.
Thinks the enemies are bees.
Sleeps 18 hours a day.
Is a good boy.

friends.name: Keeper
stories: The only one who can calm Fuzzy down.
Brings fresh salmon.
Understanding the roaring.
Brushes Fuzzy's fur.

name: Unit 01
bio: A software bug that gained consciousness. It flickers in and out of reality. It likes to mess with the ship's lighting.
stories: Thinks the universe is written in Python.
Fears the 'Blue Screen of Death'.
Can teleport short distances (lag).
Speaks in error codes.
Tries to debug reality.
Hates magnets.
Is searching for the 'Admin'.
Can crash the simulation if he thinks too hard.
Walks through walls occasionally.
Has pixelated hands.
Is buffering.

friends.name: Glitch 02
stories: Another bug.
They corrupt data together.
Communicate via binary packet loss.
Is more unstable than Unit 01.

name: Gus
bio: Drives the mothership like it's an 18-wheeler. He has fuzzy dice in the cockpit and drinks thick coffee. Good at hauling cargo.
stories: Honks the horn at passing comets.
Wears a trucker hat over his helmet.
Complains about 'space traffic'.
Has a wandering eye for nice nebulas.
Eats greasy diner food from a tube.
Listens to space-country radio.
Has a collection of mudflaps.
Refuses to ask for directions.
Thinks hyperspace is 'the fast lane'.
Calls everyone 'Good Buddy'.
Sleeps in the cab.

family.name: Ma
stories: Makes the best diner food in the galaxy.
Runs a truck stop on Saturn.
Taxes anyone who doesn't finish their plate.
Misses her baby boy.
Knits seat covers.

name: Pip
bio: So small he has to jump to reach the buttons. He is fierce but adorable. People often mistake him for a child.
stories: Got lost in a vent for 3 days.
Uses a booster seat in the cockpit.
Is constantly underestimated.
Bites ankles.
Has a high pitched voice.
Rides on Fuzzy's shoulder.
Is the best at hide and seek.
Can fit in the torpedo tube.
Hates being patted on the head.
Startles easily.
Is actually 40 years old.

friends.name: Biggs
stories: Carries Pip around.
Reaches the high shelves.
Protects Pip from bullies.
Thinks Pip is the boss.

name: Sarge
bio: Yells. A lot. He believes volume equals authority. He shines his boots until they are invisible.
stories: Yelled at a black hole and it shrank.
Polishes his boots with stardust.
Sleeps at attention.
Refuses to blink.
Eats raw eggs, shell and all.
Thinks pain is just weakness leaving the body.
Can motivate a rock to move.
Has a buzzcut underneath his helmet.
Inspects dust motes.
Is actually very lonely.
Writes poetry that is also yelling.

family.name: Private P
stories: Is terrified of Sarge.
Trying to live up to the legacy.
Is actually a gentle soul.
Sarge secretly loves him.

name: Zero
bio: Believes nothing matters. Fights because it's something to do. Stares into the void, and the void ignores him.
stories: Sighs when the alarm goes off.
Does not bother dodging.
Says 'We are all dust' as a greeting.
Refuses to celebrate victories.
Thinks the universe is a simulation (he's right).
Reads philosophy in the dark.
Has no fear because he has no hope.
Is surprisingly efficient.
Monologues about entropy.
Wears all black.
Is fun at parties (not).

name: Bolt
bio: Gotta go fast. Can't sit still. Vibrates at a high frequency. Drinks rocket fuel.
stories: Completed a lap around the ship in 2 minutes.
Talks so fast no one understands him.
Crashed into a wall... twice.
Outran a laser beam (he claims).
Taps his foot constantly.
Gets bored during briefings.
Is the first one to the mess hall.
Wears red because it's faster.
Has a racing stripe on his helmet.
Shadowboxes invisible enemies.
Is exhausting to be around.
